billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

title: Provides for exemptions for veterans of military operations in Lebanon, Grenada, Panama, and the Persian Gulf
summary: Provides that veterans in the active military, naval or air service who served during military operations in Lebanon, Grenada, Panama or the Persian Gulf, shall be eligible for the veterans alternate exemption from real property taxes.
currentCommittee: VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
actClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to establishing the dates for veterans alternative exemptions for veterans serving in operations in Lebanon, Grenada, Panama, and the Persian Gulf
